title: Take heart
creator_contributor_role: Film and Television Institute (W.A.), production company
Women's Film Fund AFC, production company
subject_group: Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Antinuclear movement - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Antinuclear movement - Australia
description: Western Australia nuclar disarmament protesters tell how they became active protesters against the United States nuclear ships using Coburn Sound. With the help of Dr Helen Caldicott the Nuclear Disarmement Party was formed in 1948 and they campaigned to have Senator Jo Valentine elected to the Australian Parliament. Shows how a small grassroots level group can succed in political ctivity.
